Font.getEscWidthY

Function/Meaning
Y-coordinate displacement in the horizontal direction of the character
Type
Font class method
Syntax
getEscWidthY(text)
Arguments
text Specifies the string for which you want to obtain the Y-coordinate displacement in the horizontal direction.
Return Value
Returns the Y-coordinate displacement in the horizontal direction in pixels.
Description
Obtains the displacement of the character drawing position required when drawing the specified characters with the current font settings.
This method allows you to obtain the displacement on the Y-coordinate when moving horizontally (to the left) relative to the character drawing direction.
See Also
Font.getEscWidthX
Font.getEscHeightX
Font.getEscHeightY
